vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
στενοχωρ-έω,
to be straitened, confined, [Refs 3rd c.BC+]: metaphorically, to be anxious, in difficulty, ἐπί τινι [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II transitive, crowd, straiten, τοὺς ἀπαντῶντας [Refs 2nd c.AD+]; τὰς πύλας, τὰς ὁδούς, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]:—passive, with future middle [Refs 4th c.AD+], to be crowded together, [Refs 1st c.BC+]; ἐν ταὐτῷ σ. [Refs 1st c.BC+]; of stricture, [Refs 1st c.AD+]; to be cramped or confined, ὁ Εὐφράτης -ούμενος [Refs 8th c.BC+]; of a picture, [Refs 4th c.AD+]
__II.2 metaphorically, press closely, tina [LXX]:—passive, to be straitened, cramped,[LXX+5th c.AD+]; ἐν τοῖς σπλάγχνοις [NT]; ὑπὸ τῶν κακῶν [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: (passive) to be crushed; to withhold, be restricted press
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(passive) to be crushed; to withhold, be restricted press
to crowd together into a narrow place, straiten;, passive metaphorically to be in straits, to be cooped up, to be cramped from action, 2Cor. 4:8; to be cramped, restrict in feeling, 2Cor. 6:12*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: estar restringido, estar limitado ; estar abrumado o agobiado (por las dificultades)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) (局限在一個狹窄的地方)) 囿限, 束縛
2) (走投無路的) 困苦 (林後 4:8)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) (局限在一个狭窄的地方)) 囿限, 束缚
2) (走投无路的) 困苦 (林后 4:8)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: hẹp hòi; khốn khổ. Xem G4730
